attributes.action: Please declare the flooded areas a disaster area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is shameful to ignor the plight of the people flooded out of their homesand places of work. It should be a national emergency. Recently we saw how failure to help the St Louis victims led to lots of critism of Bushe's Government, now we find our government is similarly lacking!Please vote for government help in those areas affected

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
